short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto web scraper powered by AI or template, and exports it as Excel or CSV files

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Target Audience
Supinfor Scraper is suitable for all users who need to collect web data, especially those who lack programming skills and for various scenarios such as market research, competitive product analysis, opinion monitoring, etc.

Intelligent recognition and a rich template library
Supinfor Scraper has built-in smart recognition technology that identifies areas of data on a web page in an instant and provides a rich library of templates so you can quickly select the data you need to capture. No need to write code, just one click and you can get the data you need.

Powerful capture capabilities
Our plug-in has powerful harvesting capabilities to help you capture the data you need from a wide range of websites. Our plug-in supports a wide range of data formats, including text, images, to meet your needs in different scenarios.

Huge amount of historical data
Showing historical data via pop-ups, it can be can be turned off via settings.
Our plug-in has a wealth of historical data to help you find the information you need faster. Our database contains a variety of data sources, including social media, news sites and more, making it easier to find the data you need.

Data processing features
Our plug-in also supports data processing functions such as image recognition and translation, making it easier for you to process the data you need. Support for exporting xlsx, csv, json, etc.

When users browse the website and use the plug-in, in order to provide better identification services and enhance the user experience, only the user's behavioral information on the use of the plug-in will be collected, and you can disable it on the settings page.


Download Video - What can we do?
Currently supports tiktok video download:
1.After searching keywords, download related videos
2.Enter the blogger's homepage, download the blogger's video
3.Enter the video detail page, download the currently playing video


Descriptionï¼š
Is it legal to download tiktok videos?
Yes it is legal, and as long as you are downloading videos for personal offline use, you are probably not doing anything illegal. However, if you want to share them in the community or use them commercially, you'll need to ask the author for permission.
